Unnamed: 1: THE UN GUIDING PRINCIPLES REPORTING FRAMEWORK

UNGP REPORTING FRAMEWORK CRITERIA
PART A: GONVERNANCE OF RESPECT FOR HUMAN RIGHTS
POLICY COMMITMENT
A1 What does the company say publicly about its commitment to respect human rights?

Unnamed: 1: A1.1 How has the public commitment been developed?
Unnamed: 2: See our Human Rights Position Statement and Action Plan: Section 5 ('Management of our Position Statement and Action Plan')

Unnamed: 2: See our Human Rights Position Statement and Action Plan: Section 3 ('Our commitment and approach to respecting and advancing human rights')

Unnamed: 1: A1.3 How is the public commitment disseminated?
Unnamed: 2: See our Human Rights Position Statement and Action Plan: Section 2 ('Scope and coverage'), Section 5 ('Management of our Position Statement and Action Plan'), and Section B.2 ('Our plan'). Additionally, our Human Rights Position Statement is publicly available online and on our internal intranet and is integrated into Group training.

Unnamed: 1: EMBEDDING RESPECT FOR HUMAN RIGHTS

Unnamed: 1: A2.5 What lessons has the company learned during the reporting period about achieving respect for human rights, and what has changed as a result?
